title: Land for Sale in Galle
details:
1. Clam environment with good surrounding
2. 5 min. Wlaking distance to Siridhamma College, HND, "Dhakshina Paya" and Labuduwa Agricultural farm.
3. Easily access main bus road (Galle Mapalagama, Galle Yakkallamulla)
4. 7min. to Southern Express way "Pinnaduwa" entrance.
5. 5min to Karapitiya Teaching Hospital and Ruhunu Medical College.
6. Can easily access super markets and shops.
7. 20min. to Galle Town.
